entry.title: Palo Alto GlobalProtect 反射型跨站脚本漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Palo Alto GlobalProtect 反射型跨站脚本漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-0133

漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： 这是一个针对CVE-2025-0133的POC，仅适用于启用了GlobalProtect网关或门户的PAN-OS防火墙配置。它通过多线程检查多个URL中的问题，并允许设置超时和将结果输出到文件中。

产品厂商： Palo Alto

产品名称： GlobalProtect

来源： https://github.com/wiseep/CVE-2025-0133

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-0133.py
  • README.md

来源概述

Description:

It is a POC for CVE-2025-0133 that is applicable only to PAN-OS firewall configurations with an enabled GlobalProtect gateway or portal.
It checks issue on multiple URLs that accepts from file, with custom thread. You can also set you timeout and get results in a file.

Example usage:

MacBook-Wiseep-Dev:github root# python3.9 CVE-2025-0133.py -h

usage: CVE-2025-0133.py [-h] –file FILE [–thread THREAD] [–timeout TIMEOUT] –output OUTPUT

Palo Alto GlobalProtect XSS Scanner

optional arguments:
-h, –help show this help message and exit

–file FILE Input file containing URLs

–thread THREAD Number of threads

–timeout TIMEOUT Timeout in seconds

–output OUTPUT Output file for results
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Palo Alto GlobalProtect 反射型跨站脚本漏洞

entry.title: Windows WebDAV Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows WebDAV Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-33053

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-33053是一个严重的WebDAV相关远程代码执行（RCE）漏洞，允许攻击者通过指向远程WebDAV共享的恶意.LNK快捷方式文件执行任意代码。利用此漏洞需要目标系统上的WebClient服务存在并运行，以及通过WebDAV的UNC路径处理处于活动状态。此检查器实时验证这些利用条件，适用于蓝队、系统管理员和漏洞审计人员。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Windows

来源： https://github.com/TheTorjanCaptain/CVE-2025-33053-Checker-PoC

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-33053_checker.ps1
  • LICENSE
  • README.md
  • misc

来源概述

CVE-2025-33053 Simple Vulnerability Checker (PowerShell)

A lightweight PowerShell script to detect if a Windows system is potentially vulnerable to CVE-2025-33053 — a critical WebDAV-related Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability.

🛡️ About CVE-2025-33053

This vulnerability allows attackers to execute malicious .LNK shortcut files that point to remote WebDAV shares, resulting in arbitrary code execution.

The exploit requires the following conditions to be true on the target system:

  1. WebClient service is present and running.
  2. UNC path handling via WebDAV is active.

This checker tests for both these real-world preconditions.

✅ What This Checker Does (Real-Time Verification)

CheckPurpose
🔍 WebClient Service StatusConfirms if WebDAV support is active on the system.
🔍 UNC Path Handling via Test-PathChecks if the system tries to resolve remote WebDAV UNC paths (core to CVE exploitation).

If both checks pass — the system is potentially exploitable via CVE-2025-33053.

🖥️ How to Run (Usage)

  1. Save the above PowerShell script as checker.ps1.

  2. Open PowerShell as Administrator.

  3. If script execution is restricted, temporarily allow running scripts:

  1. Run the script: .\CVE-2025-33053_checker.ps1

🔍 Why is this a Real-Time Checker?

✔️ WebClient Service Status is checked live — no assumptions.
✔️ UNC Path Handling uses actual OS calls (Test-Path) — which triggers real UNC resolution logic the same way a .LNK exploit would do.

✅ If UNC handling resolves (even for non-existent paths), this reflects the exact behavior that enables exploitation — thus this is not theoretical, but a direct simulation of CVE exploitation preconditions.

⚠️ Notes

This script does not exploit the vulnerability.
It is a safe, read-only checker for determining potential exposure.
Suitable for blue teams, sysadmins, vulnerability auditors.
Only for educational purposes. Do not run on systems you are not authorised to run.

🧩 Related PoC Development

A full Proof-of-Concept (PoC) exploiting CVE-2025-33053 is under development in this repository.

🏷️ License

MIT License — free to use for educational and defensive purposes.

🤝 Contributing

Pull requests welcome!
Feel free to suggest improvements or raise issues.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows WebDAV Remote Code Execution Vu

entry.title: The Recover WooCommerce Cart Abandonment, Newsletter, Email Marketing, Marketing Automation By
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rr4m-6xx9-f2wg

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-1562

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/wp-marketing-automations/tags/2.5.0/includes/api/plugin_status/class-bwfan-api-install-and-activate-plugin.php

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/wp-marketing-automations/tags/2.5.0/includes/class-bwfan-db.php#L153

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/changeset/3305437/wp-marketing-automations/trunk/admin/class-bwfan-admin.php

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/changeset/3305437/wp-marketing-automations/trunk/includes/abstracts/class-bwfan-api-base.php

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/changeset/3305437/wp-marketing-automations/trunk/includes/class-bwfan-api-loader.php

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/094972e6-7e02-4060-b069-e39c8cde9331?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rr4m-6xx9-f2wg

描述：

The Recover WooCommerce Cart Abandonment, Newsletter, Email Marketing, Marketing Automation By FunnelKit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized arbitrary plugin installation due to a missing capability check on the install_or_activate_addon_plugins() function and a weak nonce hash in all versions up to, and including, 3.5.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to install arbitrary plugins on the site that can be leveraged to further infect a vulnerable site.

entry.title: CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious .URL File and WebDAV
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious .URL File and WebDAV

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-33053

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该模块通过生成恶意的.URL文件来利用CVE-2025-33053，该文件指向一个受信任的LOLBAS二进制文件，其参数设计用于触发意外行为。可选地，生成一个有效载荷并托管在指定的WebDAV目录上。当受害者打开快捷方式时，它将尝试访问WebDAV路径，可能导致通过受信任的二进制文件实现远程代码执行。

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/1d27be2c1d8b82ec83c5c68cce48b702313bf24d/modules%2Fexploits%2Fwindows%2Ffileformat%2Fcve_2025_33053.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: IdeaCMS SQL注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： IdeaCMS SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-5569

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： IdeaCMS 1.7及以下版本中的article和product查询接口的field参数存在SQL注入漏洞。攻击者可以通过构造特定的请求利用此漏洞。此模板使用基于时间的有效载荷安全地检测漏洞。

产品厂商： IdeaCMS

产品名称： IdeaCMS

影响版本： <= 1.7

entry.title: Windows Remote Desktop Services 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows Remote Desktop Services 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-32710

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Windows Remote Desktop Services存在一个远程代码执行漏洞，允许攻击者通过特定的利用工具自动创建管理员账户、激活RDP服务并验证访问权限。此漏洞严重威胁系统安全，需立即修补。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Windows Remote Desktop Services

来源： https://github.com/Sincan2/RCE-CVE-2025-32710

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • my_rdp.py
  • run.sh
  • sodok.py

来源概述

RCE-CVE-2025-32710

Windows Remote Desktop Services Vulnerability Allows Remote Code Execution

  1. 📦 Install Dependensi
  1. 🔓 Beri Izin Eksekusi

🛠️ Cara Penggunaan

▶️ Jalankan skrip:

Anda akan melihat menu utama. Pilih sesuai kebutuhan:

🎯 Opsi 1: Serang Target Tunggal

🔹 Masukkan IP:PORT → eksploitasi langsung → tawarkan verifikasi

📋 Opsi 2: Serang Massal (berhasil.txt)

🔹 Gunakan hasil dari Opsi 3 → eksploitasi per target → verifikasi otomatis

🔍 Opsi 3: Scan RDP Canggih

🔹 Masukkan IP Range → hasil ke scan_lengkap.txt & berhasil.txt

🔥 Opsi 4: Scan & Serang Otomatis

🔹 Full otomatis: Scan -> Attack -> Verify -> Save -> Cleanup

🚪 Opsi 0: Keluar

🔹 Keluar dari aplikasi

📂 Struktur File Output

FileKeterangan
berhasil.txt💠 Target potensial hasil scan
scan_lengkap.txt📄 Output mentah dari Nmap
cok.txt🏆 Daftar target yang berhasil dieksploitasi & diverifikasi

💡 Contoh Alur Kerja (Workflow)

🎯 Target: Eksploitasi otomatis semua server RDP di 10.10.0.0/16

  1. Jalankan: ./run.sh
  2. Pilih: Opsi 4: Full Auto
  3. Masukkan range IP: 10.10.0.0/16
  4. Tunggu proses scan → exploit → verifikasi
  5. Periksa hasil di file: cok.txt ✅

🧠 Catatan Tambahan

  • Anda dapat memodifikasi payload untuk tujuan spesifik di file sodok.py
  • Disarankan menggunakan VPS yang tidak terkait identitas Anda untuk pengujian
  • Untuk bypass antivirus, pertimbangkan obfuscation payload

📫 Kontak

👤 Author: Sincan2

⭐ Dukung & Beri Bintang!

Jika Anda merasa proyek ini bermanfaat, jangan lupa beri ⭐ di GitHub Repo untuk mendukung pengembangan lebih lanjut.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows Remote Desktop Services 远程代码执行漏

entry.title: Pulse Connect Secure Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2021-22893

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Pulse Connect Secure 9.1R11.4及以下版本存在未认证的远程代码执行漏洞。攻击者可以利用路径遍历漏洞写入任意文件，通过上传webshell导致远程代码执行。此模板尝试写入一个JSP webshell，执行数学计算和’id’命令，并验证两个结果以确认远程代码执行。

产品厂商： Pulse Secure

产品名称： Pulse Connect Secure

影响版本： version <= 9.1R11.4

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/44dc91ac6ae0df9a0866bbef4d8dbcbc1972d5dc/http%2Fcves%2F2021%2FCVE-2021-22893.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
